review.title: “Good People, I-Flow is a Medical Device Company, KCC is Consumer Products.”
review.pros: Pros – Good people, recognition for people when they do something that matters.
review.cons: Cons – Pay is a problem at the company.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Get real about appropriate pay to attract and more importantly to retain employees. The pay at I-Flow is below the area and industry.

review.title: “a Kimberly-Clark company in the midst of getting KC-ized”
review.pros: Pros – multicultural workforce, nice people, lots of work to do
review.cons: Cons – many new systems due to new KC systems, negative management at leadership level
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – For the GM, the negative approach of "it will not be like this next year..." does not inspire, it does not provide a vision of where we will be, try a positive view or plan on losing.

review.title: “Competent and professional overall.”
review.pros: Pros – Nice peopleGreat productTeam environmentOn par with regulations
review.cons: Cons – Clock watchersSome dept heads are less than professional
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Should treat employees in a more professional manner.

review.title: “places to work”
review.pros: Pros – the company has a good benefits package, lots of flexibility, and excellent resources to support product sales. management provides as much support as possible.
review.cons: Cons – the cons of this job were...my long term goals are not to be involved in medical sales. creating a target list and constantly revising is not my forte.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – there has to be a way to better communicate with hundreds of people all over the country. email, conference calls with tms.
